description: Use this module to schedule a command or script file to run once in the future.

count.description: The count of units in the future to execute the command or script file.

state.description: The state dictates if the command or script file should be evaluated as present(added) or absent(deleted).

command.description: A command to be executed in the future.

units.description: The type of units in the future to execute the command or script file.

unique.description: If a matching job is present a new job will not be added.

script_file.description: An existing script file to be executed in the future.
